product_name: The North Face Litho T-Shirt - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Constructed with vertical movement in mind, the Litho T-shirt from The North Face has flat seams and a lightweight merino wool fabric that'll keep you comfortable when rock climbing or running. 19-micron merino wool is lightweight and soft; merino wool wicks moisture, dries fast and naturally resists odors. Zippered pocket is placed mid-torso for easy access. No-rise hem is cut slightly longer in back for good coverage. The North Face Summit Series(TM) apparel is designed and tested for use in harsh environments. Closeout.
short_description: Constructed with vertical movement in mind, the Litho T-shirt from The North Face has flat seams and a lightweight merino wool fabric that'll keep you comfortable when rock climbing or running.
